educations.schoolName: University of Minnesota - Carlson School of Management

fieldsOfStudy: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

educations.schoolName: Iowa State University - College of Business

headline: Computer Analyst
summary: Specialties: analysis, leadership, budgeting and forecasting, organizational management, training oversight, property administration, process improvement, security management

positions.description:
Researches government needs in science and technology to fulfill goals that have potential to be supported by academia and centers of excellence.

Tracks academic research in cyber security, sensor technology, IT enterprise, and other projects along with local security professional and agency trends in order to better support growing federal needs.
positions.title: Program Coordinator

positions.description: Understands the entire structural steel estimating, fabrication, management, and erection process. Understands the cost of labor, level of need to capture contracts for production demand, project risk, and market conditions. Performs quantity take-offs by reviewing blueprints and contract specifications in order to deliver complete proposals as required.
positions.title: Estimator

positions.description: Supervised 80 union production floor employees, shop Leads, and Supervisors across two shifts.  Reviewed project profit/loss performance with shop leadership and oversaw shop scheduling of personnel and production planning. Managed the replacement of capital equipment and other capital planning. Conducted time studies and executed Lean management projects of key shop areas. Implemented employee annual performance review procedures, scoring, and development tracking.Trained shop Leads and Supervisors on the Du Pont Safety Training Observation Program (STOP). Continued to support training needs as the company Training Manager.
positions.title: Production Manager
